slug.invalid: The slug must only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes.

meta.title: The meta title cannot be empty and must be up to 100 characters
meta.desc: Meta description cannot be empty and must be maximum 300 characters

title.label: Meta Title
title.description: Recommended length: 50-60 characters. Include relevant keywords and be descriptive. Should accurately represent the content of the page.

desc.label: Meta Description
desc.description: Provide a brief description for SEO. Ideally, between 120-160 characters.

image.label: Meta Image
image.description:
Recommended image size: 1200x630 pixels. Ensure the image is optimized for SEO with the following tips:
1. File format: JPEG, PNG, or WebP
2. File size: Under 100 KB for faster loading
3. Use high-quality images with clear details
4.

newsletter.line2: Get monthly marketing, web, mobile tips and insight.

form_contact.from_hear_placeholder: How did you hear about us?
form_contact.success_message: We have received your message and will get back to you shortly.

what_customers_say_slogan: We are proud to have worked with many clients who have shared their experiences with us. Here are some of their testimonials.

points.point1: We have a team with more than 10+ years of experience and we pride ourselves on our sophisticated, innovative processes and continuous innovation.
points.point2: Vinawebapp.com always updates and innovates technologies according to new era trends. We are proud to always create major breakthroughs in customer projects in terms of benefits and profits.
points.point3: We make highly strategic content and design decisions based on the data you provide to ensure that your website will deliver high returns for your project.
points.point4: We value straightforward, no-nonsense communication and will always accept and adapt to our customers' helpful comments.
points.point5: We build high quality websites. Our websites are always SEO optimized, load fast and deliver great user experiences - All the things Google loves.
points.point6: Our team of programmers always has experience in designing highly secure websites, preventing DDOS, and hacking websites. In addition, we also handle website harassment cases for you 24/7.

about_short.title: Our Team
about_short.slogan: We are the leading professional website design company in Vietnam. We are always ready to solve the difficulties in your project.
